name: Hi on the other side
description:
Hear this noise, Hyree? Is this cool breeze soothing? 

The same breeze can dispel the clouds you are sitting on) 

One wrong move, and you will fall into an unknown abyss ... 

He-he, you need to pass the final test before you become a real cat, grow wings, 

And you can fly freely without worrying about falling off these clouds! 

You no longer need to be afraid of heights! 

But what if you let him down? 

Did you know that there are no live cats, did not pass the exam?)
